reviewtext: I'm not a super savvy IT person, but for home use I can usually handle it.  I bought this and a Motorola SBG6580 from Amazon and both were returned after I was never able to get everything working.  It's been long enough that I don't remember specifics, but I remember being able to get a portion working but never all of it.  I don't think there was a specific issue with this but it and the Cable MODEM would not play in the same sandbox.
